column2: we must talk about something really important here -- the choco taco. Let's talk about how I haven't had a choco taco in over a decade due to food allergies
column3: and how the choco taco they have here is a) gluten-free
column4: and b) A-M-A-Z-I-N-G! It's the little things in life that bring the simplest of pleasures
column5: and this choco taco is no joke. You MUST order it!
